description: This solicitation and resulting contract tress are issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 3.37 power meters) and all terms and conditions of the SA apply.
full_summary:
Statement of Requirement for Wattmeter Kit
**Reference Number**: PW-22-01010864
**Solicitation Number**: 20221104-205205
**Publication Date**: 2022-10-21
**Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-04 T14:00:00
**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
**Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement,
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement,
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA),
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA),
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
**Region of Opportunity**: Canada
**Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
**Contracting Entity Name**: Industry Canada
**Contracting Entity Address**: Competition Bureau, 235 Queen Street,
Ottawa, ON K1A 0H5
**Contact Information**:
Kelly Stauffer
ISED-ISED@ISED-ISDE.GC.CA
(613) 990-8812

**Statement of Requirement**:

We are seeking bids for the provision of wattmeter kits to meet the requirements specified in Annex A. The requirements include:

* 74 wattmeter kits,
* Delivery of goods within the National Capital Region (NCR),
* Delivery date: February 28, 2023.
* Bid submission deadline: November 4, 2022 at 14:00
* Prices must be firm and in Canadian dollars, DDP.

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Technical compliance to the requirement presented herein and at Annex A.
* Technical compliance of equivalent (substitute) product(s) offered.
* Evaluation of the total price for the bid.

**Method of Selection**

The bid must meet the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC. The lowest priced bid that meets the evaluation criteria will be recommended for award of a contract. 

**Important Notes**

* Only the holders of the SA have been invited to submit a proposal.
* The goods and services tax (GST) and/or the Harmonized Sales Tax (HST) are not included for evaluation purposes.
* Please refer to the annexed document for more information on the specific requirements.

**Attachments**

The following documents are attached to this notice:

* Mandatory requirements evaluation for wattmeter kit (French)
* Statement of requirement for wattmeter kit (English and French)

Please
